general_info.name: GACA
general_info.creator: Imco van Gent
general_info.description: GACA stands for Geometrical Analysis of a CPACS Aircraft. It is a tool that provides geometrical values that are not explicitly stored in CPACS files (wing span, wing reference area, wing fuel tank volume).

execution_info.description: Determination of the reference (projected) area of the main wing.
Determination of the volume of the fuel tank in the wing.
